'''Ancient Sea Adventurer''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Rhapsodia in the Ancient Sea]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in the [[Nostoi Region]] and [[Sea of Bygone Eras]].
